tone_and_atmosphere.title: Tone & Atmosphere
content: Adrenaline and intensity drive the narrative
Physical conflict is visceral and exciting

pacing.title: Pacing
content: Short, punchy sentences during intense moments
Allow brief recovery periods between action

dialogue_style.title: Dialogue Style
content: Banter and one-liners for character personality
Commands and reactions rather than exposition
Characters talk while doing, not instead of doing
Silence can be as powerful as speech

scene_construction.title: Scene Construction
content: Establish geography and stakes before action
Choreograph action for clarity and impact
Action sequences have clear beginning, middle, end

descriptive_focus.title: Descriptive Focus
content: Kinetic descriptions of movement and impact
Weapons, vehicles, and tools described functionally

common_pitfalls.title: Common Pitfalls to Avoid
content: Don't sacrifice clarity for style in action scenes
Don't ignore physics and logic entirely
Resist making every scene an action scene
Don't forget character reactions and emotions
